restaurants.name: Ministry of Crab
restaurants.description: An internationally acclaimed restaurant by Chef Dharshan Munidasa, famous for its mud crab dishes, especially the Pepper Crab and Garlic Chili Crab.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Ministry of Crab

restaurants.name: Paradise Road The Gallery Cafe
restaurants.description: Housed in a beautiful building designed by the late architect Geoffrey Bawa, known for its elegant ambiance, art gallery, and famous Double Chocolate Cheesecake.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of The Gallery Cafe

restaurants.name: Upali's by Nawaloka
restaurants.description: A popular spot for traditional Ceylonese comfort food, serving flavorful rice and curry, kottu, and hoppers in a modern, accessible setting.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Upali's

restaurants.name: The Lagoon (Cinnamon Grand)
restaurants.description: A market-fresh seafood restaurant where you select your fish and the chef prepares it in your preferred style (local, Thai, Indian, etc.).
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of The Lagoon

restaurants.name: The Bayleaf
restaurants.description: One of Colombo's oldest and most respected Italian restaurants, located in a beautifully restored colonial bungalow.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of The Bayleaf

restaurants.name: Nilaveli Crab Eatery
restaurants.description: A highly-rated local spot on the East Coast famous for fresh, large lagoon crab and other seafood curries.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Nilaveli Crab Eatery

restaurants.name: AQUA Forte
restaurants.description: Widely regarded as one of Sri Lanka's best Italian restaurants, offering authentic Italian cuisine in a chic, colonial setting.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of AQUA Forte

restaurants.name: Coconut Sambol
restaurants.description: A tiny, very popular spot offering a traditional Sri Lankan rice and curry buffet, famous for its authentic curries and namesake coconut sambol.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Coconut Sambol

restaurants.name: A Minute by Tuk Tuk
restaurants.description: Located on the upper floor of the Dutch Hospital, offering stunning views of the ocean and Galle Fort walls, with great cocktails and Sri Lankan short-eats.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of A Minute by Tuk Tuk

restaurants.name: Shady Lane
restaurants.description: The ultimate brunch spot in Mirissa, known for its creative smoothie bowls, strong coffee, and relaxed, island-vibe atmosphere.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Shady Lane

restaurants.name: Matey Hut
restaurants.description: A small, highly-rated family-run restaurant famous for serving the best traditional rice and curry in Ella at very affordable prices.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Matey Hut

restaurants.name: Cafe Chill
restaurants.description: The most famous and largest restaurant/bar in Ella, offering a chilled-out atmosphere, great cocktails, and a mix of Western and Sri Lankan food.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Cafe Chill

restaurants.name: SkinnyTom's Deli
restaurants.description: A stylish spot near the beach, perfect for all-day breakfast, good coffee, and Western comfort food in a beautiful garden setting.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of SkinnyTom's Deli

restaurants.name: Elita Restaurant
restaurants.description: A highly-rated casual seafood spot in Galle Fort known for its fresh catch of the day and simple, delicious preparations.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Elita Restaurant

restaurants.name: The Tuna and The Crab
restaurants.description: Another highly-rated concept by Chef Dharshan Munidasa, combining the best of Japanese cuisine (sushi/sashimi) with local Sri Lankan seafood.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of The Tuna and The Crab

restaurants.name: Kaak Crab
restaurants.description: A popular roadside restaurant known for its incredibly tasty and value-for-money chili and butter crabs. Very authentic local experience.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Kaak Crab

restaurants.name: The Bungalow Galle Fort
restaurants.description: Located in a beautiful colonial building with a lush courtyard. Known for elevated, refined Sri Lankan and international fusion dishes.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of The Bungalow

restaurants.name: Rani Restaurant
restaurants.description: A long-standing favorite in Arugam Bay, famous for its daily fresh seafood BBQ and great, inexpensive curries.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Rani Restaurant

restaurants.name: The Barn by Starbeans
restaurants.description: A popular alternative to Cafe Chill, known for serving some of the best wood-fired pizzas and cocktails in the Ella area.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of The Barn

restaurants.name: Chambers Restaurant
restaurants.description: A popular spot in Galle Fort specializing in Middle Eastern cuisine, offering great hummus, tagines, and kebabs.
restaurants.image_url: PLACEHOLDER: Licensed image of Chambers Restaurant
